==Trivia==
* In one of the rounds of this stage, it is possible to encounter a single one of the below small [[slimes]] with the title "Rolling Elemental" as a boss. This boss-variant slime has around 50 times its usual [[HP]] and an [[Aura#Damage Abilities|Aura]] matching its element.
** {{Enemy|Cryo Slime}} with Ice Cage
** {{Enemy|Geo Slime}} with Rumbling Stone
** {{Enemy|Hydro Slime}} with Mist Bubble
** {{Enemy|Pyro Slime}} with Pursuing Fireball
